name: Emoji Hunt
description:
This is a concept game of finding real-world similarities to emojis and snapping photos of them.

If you like the game, let me know and I'll add more emojis. and make the object recognition better. If you don't like my emojis, make some 64x64 pixel images and send them to me along with something saying they may be used in this game, and I'll add them (as long as they are appropriate).


Note

The object recognition isn't fully up to speed yet so don't be too mad at the game if it has a creative view of what is what.

Also if you have an old phone like me (Samsung Galaxy S3), it does take some time to process the image.
